Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI helped me pick up spelling and grammar mistakes, but didnt provide any helpful feedback about the content of my work beyong writing style. My teacher was able to give more insightful contructive feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The feedback from GenAI made me feel reassured that I can submit my work without having grammar and spelling mistakes. My teacher's feedback made me feel like I was missing alot of details/information. I felt better about the quality of my work after making use of my teacher's feedback.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: None that I can think of in this moment.
